list_translation_mean.translate_mean: một thứ chổi có cán dài

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an implement consisting of a sponge or a bundle of thick loose strings attached to a handle, used for wiping floors or other surfaces.
clean or soak up liquid from (something) by wiping.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she mopped the floor and cleaned out two cupboards
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô lau sàn và dọn sạch hai tủ
